# uptimekuma_monitor_http (Data Source)

Get HTTP monitor information by ID or name



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) Monitor identifier
- `name` (String) Monitor name

### Read-Only

- `url` (String) URL to monitor
